name: Card City
description:
(IMPORTANT: NOT ACTUALLY AUTOMATIC)

Welcome to the Card City simulation! Here, you can use an AI to test out plans and strategies for city building, while avoiding disasters.

You play as the AI. Here's how to play.

In Card City, you manage 3 different resources: your population/people, your food, and your money. Each building is represented by a card. There are two types of cards: active and passive cards. Passive cards do the ability listed without you having to do things, and active cards require you activate them. Each card has a cost in resources.

Each turn you have 3 actions. These actions can be buying a card or activating an active card. Then, there may be a disaster. Each disaster has a different effect. Sometimes this may destroy more resources than you have. If so, you lose. Try to manage the city better for the mayor next time.
